name: Novotel Firenze Nord Aeroporto

reviews.text: I was there for a day. Overall, it was a decent and simple hotel.
reviews.title: An average hotel

reviews.text: Check-in service was a little slow.
reviews.title: for the budget traveler

reviews.text: Breakfast was simple. Selection could be better.
reviews.title: It was ok

reviews.text: Beds and pillow was not comfortable.
reviews.title: Old & hard beds with almost no matress & with bed bugs.. Smelly washroom with old fixtures.. But awesome staff

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel as part of a Trafalgar Tour of Italy and loved it! Maybe because we were in Italy in August and it was super hot, but we absolutely loved the pool! The common space was clean and neat. Staff was very friendly. Rooms were clean and neat. Can't ask for much more! Not the best location if you want to be close to the main attractions but only about 20 minutes away via bus.
reviews.title: Yes, Please!

reviews.text: We arrived at this Novotel and we believed it to be closed as it was so dark. They had a save energy day so all was a bit dark inside but we liked the idea.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, small rooms, traffic is hearable from 7th floor.

reviews.text: First stop was to our room. It was a tiny room where they had managed to placed 2 extra single beds in. So there was not much space to move in. We were on the 7th floor and as we opened the window to let in some fresh air as the room was warm we closed it as there was so much noise due to traffic next to the hotel ( provincial road?) We went downstairs for dinner and found out that people dine late , really late in Italy. The waiter his English was non existence so it was a bit hard to get what we wanted the apple juice turned out to be pineapple juice, the merlot became a sauvignon( kinda hard to get that wrong..duh) and all went like that.
reviews.title: The older reviews must be outdated

reviews.text: The other waitress was a bit more into English but it still was hard to know what was going on if they reply with an answer totally not related to our question ..lol
reviews.title: Good for overnight stay

reviews.text: The rooms said was tiny but clean as well as the shower, toilet and bidet. I would not stay here again to be honest as I disliked all the noise from traffic being situated on the 7th floor and still hearing that way into the night. Beds are not the best beds ever as they were hard.
reviews.title: Novotel Firenze

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked an "Executive Room" for 2 adults ( price is higher for 2 adults vs. one adult). Checked in to find long black hair everywhere over bathroom and floors clearly had not been vacuumed. Informed front desk who did appologize and sent someone up to vacuum. No offer to change rooms though. Was also shocked later to realize that 2 out of 4 "upgraded" toiletries had already been used ( safety seal broken on both and only 3/4 full). Also, only 1 set robe and slippers....unacceptable considering you pay more for the second person, which we assumed covered costs of amenities for 2 people vs. 1.
reviews.title: Very disappointing

reviews.text: Checked out very early for flight so no chance to speak with a manager. While this hotel airport is not usually the type of property we would stay ( and didn't expect much - just a nice clean room) we did so for airport convenience but NO excuse for lack of cleanliness...even the hallway floors were filthy. Needless to say, not a good nights sleep and would never go back.
reviews.title: Nice hotel, older but nice.

reviews.text: The hotel is close to the airport, which is convenient but your in the commercial district. No restaurants close by at all. If you don't want to hop in your car the hotel has some basic items. The breakfast is pretty typical at Novotel. An egg item, bacon, sausage, breads, some cereal, yogurts and dried fruits. Will hold you over for a nice lunch in the city. Had a nice set up for kids to play X-box/Wii in the lobby.
reviews.title: Great price, good services and breakfast

reviews.text: We stayed in this hotel for 2 nights while visiting Florence. I have to say that the hotel was very good and had a great price when comparing to other hotels in the area. It is true that it is not in the city center but they offer a free shuttle to the center which we found a great option, from 8am to 8pm. We took it in the morning and then returned by taxi (for 20 euros). Breakfast was good and also the rooms. Our only complain was that during this period of the year the air conditioners do not work and for us the temperature in the rooms were a bit too hot. Free parking and very easy to find if driving to Florence.
reviews.title: Comfortable hotel with good location

reviews.text: We stayed here with family and had a comfortable stay. The elevator was a bit slow and clunky, but staff were very helpful and more than made up for the rest of the trip.
reviews.title: Enjoyed my stay, good disabled access

reviews.text: Stayed at the Novotel Firenze Nord the day before flying out of Italy. Was impressed by the staff in particular. They were quite warm and welcoming, especially at breakfast. They have a shuttle to the airport and the city. There is a gap between 11am and the next service at 17:30, but otherwise fine. The rooms were old but well maintained. They actually have keys for the doors instead of cards. The gym is small but has all the necessary equipment. It had one treadmill and one bicycle and a good selection of weights. The waiter at the breakfast table struck up a friendly conversation with us, which was very nice.
reviews.title: Good Modern Hotel near the airport

reviews.text: After an amazing visit to Rome and Firenze, our last night was spent at Novotel by the airport. Very clean and organized, good shuttle service and very lovely breakfast buffet. Very helpful staff. Room was small, but cozy and quiet..great bed, good shower!! Will explore this chain for future travel.
reviews.title: Wonderful Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Spring Trip to Tuscany

reviews.text: Shuttle - very good (free shuttle to airport and city centre and back)
reviews.title: Perfect hotel!

description: The Novotel Firenze Nord Aeroporto is a comfortable 180-room 4-star hotel ideally located near the airport and A1 highway, giving easy access to Florence city center and the train station. 9 meeting rooms and free WIFI available. Shuttle to airport and city center runs at fixed times, subject to booking and availability. Perfect for business or leisure, the hotel offers rooms for 2 adults and 2 children, restaurant, bar, open air swimming pool and indoor car park.
